# Introduction {#introduction}

This documentation is for for a version of the Stochastic Time Inverted Lagrangian Transport (STILT) model, available on [Github](https://github.com/benfasoli/stilt/).

## Quick-start {#quickstart}

Done this before and just looking to start a new project?

1. Initialize myproject with `Rscript -e "uataq::stilt_init('myproject')"`
2. Edit `r/run_stilt.r` to set receptor timing/locations and model parameters
3. Run the model with `Rscript r/run_stilt.r`
